manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) NOT NULL, `weid` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `starttime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `endtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `kj_intro` text, `p_kc` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `p_y_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `p_low_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `yf_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `copyright` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `copyright_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `hot_tel` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `kj_dialog_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `rank_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `u_fist_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `u_already_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `fk_fist_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `fk_already_tip` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `kj_rule` text, `pay_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `p_model` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `kj_follow_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `join_follow_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `follow_dlg_tip` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `follow_btn_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `share_bg` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `rank_num` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `join_rank_num` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `v_user` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `zt_address` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `one_kj_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `day_help_count` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `submit_money_limit` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `hx_enabled` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `show_index_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `index_sort` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `announcement` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `zgg_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `join_user_limit` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `help_limit` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `locationlimit` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `bgmusic` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `erweim` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `kc_type` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `lq_type` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `cid` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `shtel` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `gid` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `templateid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `hfbk_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_address` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `unid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `is_default` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `uname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `province` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `county` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `openid` (`openid`,`unid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_category` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `typname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `icon_type` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `systypeicon` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `typeicon` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `display_sort` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `weid` (`weid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_firend` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uid` int(10) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kd` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `kname` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `msg` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ac` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `headimgurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `k_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `kh_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `ip` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index_kid` (`kid`), KEY `index_uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=522 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_goods` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `p_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `p_pic` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `p_preview_pic` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `p_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `weid` (`weid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_index_setting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) NOT NULL, `pagesize` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `announcement` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `banner_bg` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `banner_url` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ppt_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `category_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `home_style` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_order` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `privnce` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `town` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `outno` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `order_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `wxorder_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `y_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `kh_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `yf_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `total_price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pay_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `p_model` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `wxnotify` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `notifytime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `unid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `lq_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_ppts` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `p_type` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `kid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `pptname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `dsort` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `images` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ppt_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(50) DEFAULT NULL, `kid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `new_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `new_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `new_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_setting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) NOT NULL, `appid` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `appsecret` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `mchid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `shkey` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `is_collect_user_info` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `help_kj_limit` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `tmp_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `tmpId` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `fh_tmp_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `fh_tmp_id` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `kf` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_template` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `templatename` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `preview_pic` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `dirname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `tempalte_type` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_user` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kid` int(10) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `kd` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `headimgurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `price` float(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `unid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index_kid` (`kid`), KEY `index_openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=95 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_sanlian_xkwkj_user_info` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `headimgurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `uname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
